page.title: 06SOCIAL CONCERN
page.content: THERE ARE TWO MAIN SOURCES OF SOCIAL CONCERN IN THE AREA. UNEMPLOYMENT IS UNDOUBTEDLY THE SCOURGE OF OUR TIME.AS WELL AS CREATING MAJOR FINANCIAL HARDSHIPS IT HAS LED TO MANY SOCIAL PROBLEMS IN THE HOMES OF THE UNEMPLOYED.MANY OF THOSE PEOPLE WHO WERE MADE REDUNDANT WERE GIVEN SUBSTANTIAL AMOUNTS OF MONEY.IN MANY INSTANCES THIS MONEY WAS SQUANDERED AND AFTER A PERIOD OF PLENTY FAMILIES WERE CONFRONTED WITH THE REALITY OF LIVING ON A VERY RESTRICTED INCOME.THIS HAS GIVEN RISE TO A VARIETY OF DOMESTIC PROBLEMS. THE OTHER CAUSE FOR CONCERN IS THE LACK OF FACILITIES FOR THE YOUNG PEOPLE IN THE AREA WHO HAVE VERY LITTLE HOPE OF GAINING FULL TIME EMPLOYMENT AND FIND IT INCREASINGLY DIFFICULT TO GAINFULLY PASS THEIR TIME
